sqlMap.select: SELECT attributeValue subRef, role FROM $prefix$propertyMultiAttrib WHERE propMultiAttribGuid = #param1#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $prefix$propertyMultiAttrib ( propMultiAttribGuid, propertyGuid, attributeType, attributeId, attributeValue, subRef, role, entryStateGuid ) VALUES ( #id#, #propertyId#, #attributeType#, #attributeId#, #attributeValue#, #subRef#, #role#, #entryStateId# )
